SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into eb_store_coupon_copy (id, title, integral, coupon_price, use_min_price, coupon_time, sort, status, add_time, is_del, ctime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{integral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{couponPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{useMinPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{couponTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{addTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update eb_store_coupon_copy set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, integral = #{integral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, coupon_price = #{couponPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, use_min_price = #{useMinPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, coupon_time = #{couponTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, title, integral, coupon_price, use_min_price, coupon_time, sort, status, add_time, is_del, ctime from eb_store_coupon_copy where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
